parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.
Where, whither, when, in what place. Genitive case of hos as adverb; at which place, i.e. Where.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A prostitute; met: an idolatrous community. Feminine of pornos; a strumpet; figuratively, an idolater.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
